attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe that as a country we should start to own industries, this could start with car manufacturers, supported by civil servants using the cars as company cars. Start to own public transport as we invest in private companies we may as well own it, then own the garages to service the above and so on so making the country stable & making it easier to lead by example, i.e. using greener fuels, and even if government companies just break even the stability of jobs would help the economy no end. eg the companies would be British gas, B.T. Rover, British Leyland, stagecoach etc. buying shares in some & reserecting others

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Penalty4offshore/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
